sub_title: Java Engineer and Founder at Bara Company
summary:
During my Master of Science program, I attended a course from the business incubator from the university. I have developed interests in Computer Programming and initiated a start-up company for IT solution, which has equipped me as a fast learner to develop the solution in a fast-paced manner and effective communication to sell the product in wide variety of customers and also potential investor. 
Next to it, my master thesis combined Data Mining (analytics) application (using one of popular AI: Bayesian Belief Network) for very large data of reservoir simulation in order to automatically assimilate new data to the computer model. Moreover, i have equipped myself with strong programming background, achieving perfect score in Matlab programming.
